solution_line_template: The birds' flying distance between Lake Jim through lake Disney to lake London is {distance_jim_disney}+{distance_disney_london} = <<{distance_jim_disney}+{distance_disney_london}={distance_per_bird}>>{distance_per_bird} miles.

Since each bird flies the {distance_per_bird} miles distance while migrating, the combined distance they fly together is {distance_per_bird}*{num_birds} = <<{distance_per_bird}*{num_birds}={combined_distance}>>{combined_distance} miles.
